page.title: 05My Special Day 2
page.content: At half past three we finished playing and I helped Hefin,my brother to put manure in the garden.By the time we had finished it was tea time.After tea Daniela friend came down and we went to the field to play soccer.We all took turns at scoring and saving.We finished playing at twenty five past seven and we went in.I watched Coronation Street and ate my supper at the same time.After supper I watched a film called Hawk the Slayer on H.T.V. and it finished at ten o' clock.I then went to bed,contented with my special day.
